ygData.subject: Spell Casters of Solusek Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: In an effort for cooperation of the spell casters on the Solusek Ro server I have created a message board at the following URL:
ygData.messageBody:
In an effort for cooperation of the spell casters on the Solusek Ro server I
have created a message board at the following URL:

http://www.InsideTheWeb.com/mbs.cgi/mb533943

Please keep the posts to only those that reside on the Solusek Ro server.
We're about helping each other in the game (No not twinking and I'm not even
gonna open up that can of worms again), acquiring and improving languages,
questing together, and helping each other in general. Any messages
derogatory or 'whiny' in general will be immediately removed. This isn't the
place to post about what's wrong with the class, or what should be changed.
Rather how we can help each other with what we've got to work with. : )

Zalbar
20th Wizard
Solusek Ro
